They are kind and thorough.
I have always found them communicative.

originalText.text:
I have read some of the reviews for Dr. Mitnick and not to be repetitive I must.
She is compassionate, calming and has true concern for her patients.
Through diagnostic measures, my wife was found to have the beginning stage of breast XXXXXX ( not to use the word).
With all the adjectives above, Dr. Mitnick apprised her of the findings. What a stressful position to be in for a doctor to be confronted with on an ongoing basis.
Upon biopsy confirmation, Dr Mitnick recommended a surgeon and that surgeon recommended a reconstructive surgeon.
To fast forward, the procedure was done at NYU Langone, a wonderful facility.

Dr. Mitnick, I want to say Thank You for the person you are and the relationship we’ve had over the past 30 years.
As well,  for facilitating my care plan and helping me get through the rough spots.
Karen Kolker

originalText.text: Dr. Julie Mitnick has been my doctor for over 20 years!  She is thorough, spends time with you explaining your results and spots things that most doctors can miss. She is also available for any follow-up questions you may have.  She is brilliant and I am so thankful she is my doctor!!!

originalText.text: Excellent physician, meticulous in everything and tenderly compassionate and empatheric...my favorite doctor ever.
